title: Industrial Capacity: Mining, Quarrying, and Oil and Gas Extraction: Coal Mining (NAICS = 2121)
notes:
Industrial Capacity (CAP) is the amount of resources available to enable an industry to produce goods.

For more information, see the explanatory notes (https://www.federalreserve.gov/releases/g17/About.htm) issued by the Board of Governors. For recent updates, see the announcements (https://www.federalreserve.gov/feeds/g17.html) issued by the Board of Governors

NAICS: 2121

Source Code: CAP.N2121.A
